alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:15PM CDT until June 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Gillespie County in south central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 515 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doss to near Tivydale, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Cherry Spring, Tivydale, Doss and Harper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
